dt-api.name: rowReorder.disable()
dt-api.summary: Disable the user's ability to reorder rows.

type.description: Disable the end user's ability to click and drag to reorder rows.

dt-api.description:
It can sometimes be useful to enable and disable the end user's ability to reorder rows, for example while processing an update at the server-side. This method provides the ability to disable RowReorder. When disabled click and drag events will not be processed by RowReorder.
Its companion method `-api rowReorder.enable()` can then be used to re-enable user interaction if required.
